instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all Headings (h1-h3) and 'IBM Plex Sans' for body text and data tables.
Implement the 'Control Room Grid' for the dashboard: dense, data-rich, but with 16px-24px gaps.
Use the defined HSL color values in index.css. Do not use hex codes directly in components.
For charts, use Recharts with the custom 'chart_1' through 'chart_5' colors defined in the palette.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states defined (e.g., hover:bg-accent).
Do not use 'Inter' font. Use the imported fonts.
For the 'Add Transaction' button, use the Primary color but ensure it has a distinct position or size to stand out.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers or overlays.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
